lead_paragraph: After Quentin goes on an all-night adventure through his hometown with his mysterious neighbor Margo, she suddenly disappears, leaving behind clues for Quentin and his crew to decode. The search pushes Quentin to explore the true meaning of friendship - and love. Based on the novel by John Green.
